talents.name: Knowledge of the Past
talents.info_text: You concentrate for a moment to recall some of your memories as a living being and look for knowledge to identify rare objects.

Improves your ghoulish body, increasing Strength and Constitution by 2, 5, 8, 10, 12.

Your body also becomes incredibly resilient to damage, you can never take a blow that deals more than 90%, 80%, 70%, 60%, 50% of your maximum life.
talents.name: Ghoul

talents.range: <acronym class="variable" title="Values for levels 1-5, talent mastery 1.30">5.0, 7.0, 8.0, 10.0, 11.0</acronym>
talents.name: Ghoulish Leap

talents.info_text:
Vomit on the ground around you, healing any undead in the area and damaging anyone else.

Lasts 7, 10, 13, 15, 17 turns, and deals 34, 42, 48, 52, 56 blight damage or heals 52, 63, 72, 79, 85 life.

Creatures standing in the retch also have 6%, 14%, 20%, 25%, 30% chance to remove a physical effect each turn.

Undeads will be stripped from a detrimental effect while others will be stripped from a beneficial effect.
talents.name: Retch

talents.info_text:
Gnaw your target for 31%, 44%, 54%, 63%, 70% damage. If your attack hits, the target may be infected with Ghoul Rot for 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns.

Each turn, Ghoul Rot inflicts 21, 27, 32, 36, 40 blight damage. At talent level 2, Ghoul Rot also reduces Strength by 9;, 11;, 13;, 15;, 17; at level 3 it reduces Dexterity by 9, 11, 13, 15, 17, and at level 4 it reduces Constitution by 9, 11, 13, 15, 17.

At talent level 5 targets suffering from Ghoul Rot rise as friendly ghouls when slain.

The blight damage and stat damage scales with your Constitution.
talents.name: Gnaw

talents.info_text: You fade from sight, making you invulnerable until the beginning of your next turn.
talents.name: Fade
Blindside
talents.info_text: With blinding speed you suddenly appear next to a target up to 10 spaces away and attack for 1%, 1%, 1%, 1%, 2% damage.

talents.info_text:
Throws a pack of bones at your target doing 224, 308, 373, 428, 476 physical damage as bleeding.

The damage will increase with the Strength stat
talents.name: Throw Bones

description: Talents of the various entities of the world.

talents.info_text: Improves your skeletal condition, increasing Strength and Dexterity by 2, 5, 8, 10, 12.
talents.name: Skeleton
Bone Armour
talents.info_text:
Creates a shield of bones, absorbing 503, 611, 695, 765, 826 damage. Lasts for 10 turns.

The total damage the shield can absorb increases with your Dexterity.
Your undead bones are very resilient, reducing the duration of all detrimental effects on you by up to 13%, 26%, 35%, 42%, 48%.
talents.name: Resilient Bones
Re-assemble
talents.info_text:
Re-position some of your bones, healing yourself for 146, 301, 419, 519, 607.

At level 5, you will gain the ability to completely re-assemble your body should it be destroyed (can only be used once)
